original: manydzu shr'i ni 'jam dpal lo //
analyzed: manydzu shr'i ni 'jam dpal lo //
translated: Mañjuśrī means Gentle Splendor.

original: pa ri shuddh'i t'a ni yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: pa ri shuddh'i t'a ni yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: Pariśuddhā means purified.

original: mu p'a ni lus so //🔽d'a ye ti aa zhes pa ni go 'phang ngo //
analyzed: mu p'a ni lus so // d'a ye ti aa zhes pa ni go 'phang ngo //
translated: Mūrdhni means head.🔽Āyate means state.

original: aa ni thabs la /
analyzed: aa ni thabs la /
translated: A means means.

original: aa: ni shes rab bo //
analyzed: aa: ni shes rab bo //
translated: Aḥ means wisdom.

original: de'i don ni ji srid du chos thams cad yongs su dag pa ma bcos pa @183a * //
analyzed: de'i don ni ji srid du chos thams cad yongs su dag pa ma bcos pa @183a * //
translated: The meaning is: As long as all phenomena are unfabricated and purified,

original: gang la yod pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi sku /
analyzed: gang la yod pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi sku /
translated: one will attain the state of the wisdom body of all tathāgatas,

original: yongs su dag pa 'jam dpal gyi ming can de'i go 'phang thob par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: yongs su dag pa 'jam dpal gyi ming can de'i go 'phang thob par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: which is called Mañjuśrī, the purified one.

original: da ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: Now, in order to teach the essence of all tathāgatas, it is said:

original: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Oṃ, all tathāgatas... and so forth.

original: 'di ni rgyun du bgrang bar bya ba'i snying por shes par bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni rgyun du bgrang bar bya ba'i snying por shes par bya'o //
translated: This should be known as the essence to be recited continuously.

original: sarba ta th'a ga ta ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad do //
analyzed: sarba ta th'a ga ta ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad do //
translated: Sarvatathāgata means all tathāgatas.

original: hri da ya ni snying po ste ye shes kyi sku'o //
analyzed: hri da ya ni snying po ste ye shes kyi sku'o //
translated: Siddha means essence, which is the jnana-kaya.

original: des na ye shes kyi sku de de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka na gnas pa de rtogs pas ci byed ce na /
analyzed: des na ye shes kyi sku de de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka na gnas pa de rtogs pas ci byed ce na /
translated: Therefore, what does that jnana-kaya, which abides in the heart of all Tathagatas, do when it is realized?

original: ha ra ha ra ste tha mal pa'i lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi nyon mongs pa thams cad 'phrog par byed pa'o //
analyzed: ha ra ha ra ste tha mal pa'i lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi nyon mongs pa thams cad 'phrog par byed pa'o //
translated: Hara hara means take away, which is to say, it takes away all the defilements of body, speech, and mind.

original: 'phrog pas cir 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: 'phrog pas cir 'gyur zhe na /
translated: What happens when it is taken away?

original: de gang gi snying po na /
analyzed: de gang gi snying po na /
translated: It is the essence of that,

original: sku gsung thugs kyi snying po'o //
analyzed: sku gsung thugs kyi snying po'o //
translated: which is the essence of body, speech, and mind.

original: des las ci byed na /
analyzed: des las ci byed na /
translated: What does it do?

original: khams gsum gyi rtogs pa 'phrog cing 'joms par byed pa'o //
analyzed: khams gsum gyi rtogs pa 'phrog cing 'joms par byed pa'o //
translated: It takes away and destroys the concepts of the three realms.

original: aom h'um hr'i /
analyzed: aom h'um hr'i /
translated: Om hum hri.

original: zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes gsungs te /
translated: It is said,

original: sku gsung thugs su 'gyur pa'o //
analyzed: sku gsung thugs su 'gyur pa'o //
translated: Om hum hri.

original: gang gi yin na /
analyzed: gang gi yin na /
translated: What is it?

original: bha ga w'a na te bcom ldan 'das kyi'o //
analyzed: bha ga w'a na te bcom ldan 'das kyi'o //
translated: It is the Bhagavan's, which is to say, the Blessed One's.

original: mtshan gyi khyad par gsungs pa /🔽dzny'a na m'urti zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: mtshan gyi khyad par gsungs pa / dzny'a na m'urti zhes gsungs te /
translated: The special name is stated:🔽Jnanamurti.

original: ye shes kyi lus zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ye shes kyi lus zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
translated: It is said, Jnanamurti, which means the body of wisdom.

original: de tshig gi sgo nas ston par byed pas na /
analyzed: de tshig gi sgo nas ston par byed pas na /
translated: Since it is taught by means of words,

original: w'a g'i shva ra ste /
analyzed: w'a g'i shva ra ste /
translated: Vāgīśvara.

original: ngag la dbang byed pas na ngag gi dbang phyug go //
analyzed: ngag la dbang byed pas na ngag gi dbang phyug go //
translated: Since he controls speech, he is the Lord of Speech.

original: tshig gi sgo nas bstan pas cir 'gyur snyam pa la /
analyzed: tshig gi sgo nas bstan pas cir 'gyur snyam pa la /
translated: What is the point of teaching by means of words?

original: ma h'a w'a tsa zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: ma h'a w'a tsa zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: Mahāvāca.

original: chos thams cad gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyi skur 'tshed cing kha dog sgyur par byed do //
analyzed: chos thams cad gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyi skur 'tshed cing kha dog sgyur par byed do //
translated: He is the one who cooks and colors all phenomena into the body of nondual gnosis.🔽Where?

original: gang na / sarba dharm'a ste chos thams cad do //
analyzed: gang na / sarba dharm'a ste chos thams cad do //
translated: Sarvadharmāḥ, all phenomena.

original: ci dang ci 'dra bar na /
analyzed: ci dang ci 'dra bar na /
translated: What is their likeness?

original: ga ga na ste nam mkha' dang 'dra bar ro //
analyzed: ga ga na ste nam mkha' dang 'dra bar ro //
translated: Gagana, like space.

original: aa ma la ni dri ma med pa'o //
analyzed: aa ma la ni dri ma med pa'o //
translated: Amalā, stainless.

original: de nyid gsal bar bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: de nyid gsal bar bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to clearly demonstrate that,

original: su pa ri shuddh'a ste shin tu yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: su pa ri shuddh'a ste shin tu yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: supariśuddhā, extremely pure.

original: de thams cad gar bsdu na /
analyzed: de thams cad gar bsdu na /
translated: In order to gather all of that,

original: dharma dh'a tu ste chos kyi dbyings dang / dzny'a na garbha ste ye shes kyi snying po /
analyzed: dharma dh'a tu ste chos kyi dbyings dang / dzny'a na garbha ste ye shes kyi snying po /
translated: dharmadhātu, the realm of phenomena, and jñānagarbha, the essence of gnosis.

original: aa: ste skye ba med par thim pa'o //
analyzed: aa: ste skye ba med par thim pa'o //
translated: Aḥ, dissolves into non-arising.

original: de'i don ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka na bzhugs pa'i bcom ldan 'das ye shes kyi sku de @183b tshig gi sgo nas bstan pas /
analyzed: de'i don ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka na bzhugs pa'i bcom ldan 'das ye shes kyi sku de @183b tshig gi sgo nas bstan pas /
translated: The meaning of that is as follows: The Bhagavān who resides in the hearts of all tathāgatas, the jñānakāya, is taught by means of words.

original: khams gsum gyi lus ngag yid kyi nyon mongs pa 'phrog par byed pa'o //
analyzed: khams gsum gyi lus ngag yid kyi nyon mongs pa 'phrog par byed pa'o //
translated: [He] seizes the afflictions of body, speech, and mind in the three realms.

original: de'i mtshan nyid kyi khyad par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: de'i mtshan nyid kyi khyad par bstan pa ni /
translated: The special characteristics of that are taught.

original: chos thams cad nam mkha' dang 'dra bar dri ma med par chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i ye shes so //
analyzed: chos thams cad nam mkha' dang 'dra bar dri ma med par chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i ye shes so //
translated: All phenomena are like space, stainless, the wisdom of the pure dharmadhātu.

original: des rnam par rtog pa thams cad de nyid du 'gyur par byed pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: des rnam par rtog pa thams cad de nyid du 'gyur par byed pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: By that, all conceptual thoughts are transformed into suchness—that is the meaning.

original: de dag gis rgyud kyi dngos po yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: de dag gis rgyud kyi dngos po yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: By those, in order to fully understand the nature of the tantra,

original: lan gnang ba bshad zin pa ste rdzogs zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: lan gnang ba bshad zin pa ste rdzogs zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: the reply has been explained—that is the meaning of “completed.”

original: da ni bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don la rjes su yi rang ba'i tshul gyis gus pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don la rjes su yi rang ba'i tshul gyis gus pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: Now, in order to demonstrate respect by the method of rejoicing in the meaning taught by the Bhagavān,

original: de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang //
analyzed: de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang //
translated: Then, the glorious Vajradhara,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: and so forth.

original: de nas zhes bya ba ni bar gang gis kyang mchod pa ste /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba ni bar gang gis kyang mchod pa ste /
translated: Then means without any interval.

original: zhus pa'i lan gsungs pa'i de ma thag pa'o //
analyzed: zhus pa'i lan gsungs pa'i de ma thag pa'o //
translated: Immediately after the reply to the question.

original: dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang ni sdud pa po ste /
analyzed: dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang ni sdud pa po ste /
translated: The glorious Vajradhara is the compiler.

original: tshig gi don bshad zin to //
analyzed: tshig gi don bshad zin to //
translated: The meaning of the words has been explained.

original: dga' zhing mgu nas thal mo sbyar //
analyzed: dga' zhing mgu nas thal mo sbyar //
translated: Rejoicing and delighted, he joined his palms,

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /
translated: and so forth.

original: sdud pa po chos thos pas dga' ba ste mdangs phyung zhes pa'o //
analyzed: sdud pa po chos thos pas dga' ba ste mdangs phyung zhes pa'o //
translated: The compiler, hearing the Dharma, was delighted, meaning he was thrilled.

original: mgu ni rjes su yi rang ba'o //
analyzed: mgu ni rjes su yi rang ba'o //
translated: Delighted means he was pleased.

original: thal mo sbyar ba ni gus pa'i don to //
analyzed: thal mo sbyar ba ni gus pa'i don to //
translated: Joining his palms means he was respectful.

original: yang na dga' zhing mgu ba ni /
analyzed: yang na dga' zhing mgu ba ni /
translated: Alternatively, rejoicing and delighted

original: bde ba rgyas pa'o //
analyzed: bde ba rgyas pa'o //
translated: means bliss expanded.

original: mgon po bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs //
analyzed: mgon po bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs //
translated: The protector, the Bhagavān, the Tathāgata,

original: zhes pa ni bdag dang gzhan gyi mgon mdzad pa la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni bdag dang gzhan gyi mgon mdzad pa la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: is called that because he is the protector of self and other.

original: de ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje 'chang ste /
analyzed: de ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje 'chang ste /
translated: He is the Bhagavān, the Tathāgata Vajradhara,

original: ming gzhan sh'akya thub pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: ming gzhan sh'akya thub pa zhes bya'o //
translated: also known by the other name Śākyamuni.

original: rdzogs sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal nas //
analyzed: rdzogs sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal nas //
translated: Having bowed to the perfect Buddha,

original: zhes pa ni rang gi ston pa'i zhabs la spyi bos gtugs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni rang gi ston pa'i zhabs la spyi bos gtugs pa'o //
translated: this means that he bowed his head to the feet of his teacher.

original: de ni zhes pa ni rdo rje 'chang ngo //
analyzed: de ni zhes pa ni rdo rje 'chang ngo //
translated: He means Vajradhara.

original: bdag dang gzhan gyi mgon du gyur pas so //
analyzed: bdag dang gzhan gyi mgon du gyur pas so //
translated: He is the protector of self and others.

original: gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje khro bo'i rgyal zhes pa la /
analyzed: gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje khro bo'i rgyal zhes pa la /
translated: The Lord of Secrets, Vajrapani, is called the King of Wrathful Ones.

original: sku gsung thugs kyi gsang ba 'dzin pa ste bshad zin to //
analyzed: sku gsung thugs kyi gsang ba 'dzin pa ste bshad zin to //
translated: He is the holder of the secrets of body, speech, and mind, as has been explained.

original: lag na rdo rje khro bo'i rgyal //
analyzed: lag na rdo rje khro bo'i rgyal //
translated: Vajrapani, the King of Wrathful Ones,

original: zhes pa ni de'i ming can gyi 'khor rnams so //
analyzed: zhes pa ni de'i ming can gyi 'khor rnams so //
translated: means his retinue who have that name.

original: sna tshogs gzhan dang lhan cig tu //
analyzed: sna tshogs gzhan dang lhan cig tu //
translated: Together with various others,

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /
translated: means that.

original: sgrol ma dang khro gnyer can la sogs pa'i dpa' mo rnams ni sna tshogs pa'o //
analyzed: sgrol ma dang khro gnyer can la sogs pa'i dpa' mo rnams ni sna tshogs pa'o //
translated: The various ones are the heroines such as Tara and Bhairava.

original: gzhan zhes pa ni sdud pa po las gzhan du gyur pa'i 'khor rnams so //
analyzed: gzhan zhes pa ni sdud pa po las gzhan du gyur pa'i 'khor rnams so //
translated: Others means the retinue who are different from the compiler.

original: lhan cig ces pa ni de rnams dang mnyam por zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: lhan cig ces pa ni de rnams dang mnyam por zhes pa'i don to //
translated: Together means with them.

original: gsang bstod nas @184a * //
analyzed: gsang bstod nas @184a * //
translated: Having praised the secret,

original: ni tshig 'di gsol //🔽zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: ni tshig 'di gsol //🔽zhes bya ba la /
translated: he spoke these words.

original: skad gsang la che bas 'og nas 'byung ba rnams gsol ba'o //
analyzed: skad gsang la che bas 'og nas 'byung ba rnams gsol ba'o //
translated: The loudness of the voice is for the sake of the following: I request...

original: da ni don chen po'i phyir rjes su yi rang ba bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni don chen po'i phyir rjes su yi rang ba bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: Now, in order to teach rejoicing for the sake of the great meaning,

original: mgon po zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: mgon po zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: [the text] declares O Protector... and so forth.

original: kye mgon po zhes pos nas bdag cag ces pa ni 'khor rnams so //
analyzed: kye mgon po zhes pos nas bdag cag ces pa ni 'khor rnams so //
translated: Having addressed O Protector, we refers to the retinue.

original: yi rang ba ni mgu ba'o //
analyzed: yi rang ba ni mgu ba'o //
translated: Rejoicing is delighting.

original: legs so zhes bya ba ni bdag gi don du chos snang ba'o //
analyzed: legs so zhes bya ba ni bdag gi don du chos snang ba'o //
translated: Excellent is for one's own benefit, the appearance of the Dharma.

original: yang legs so zhes bya ba ni gzhan don du'o //
analyzed: yang legs so zhes bya ba ni gzhan don du'o //
translated: Again, excellent is for the benefit of others.

original: yang na lhag ma ma lus pa'o //
analyzed: yang na lhag ma ma lus pa'o //
translated: Or, it is the remainder without exception.

original: legs par gsungs zhes bya ba ni sgra la skyon med de /
analyzed: legs par gsungs zhes bya ba ni sgra la skyon med de /
translated: What is called well-spoken is the faultless sound.

original: thog ma dang / bar dang ; mthar dge bar gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: thog ma dang / bar dang ; mthar dge bar gsungs pa'o //
translated: It is said to be virtuous in the beginning, middle, and end.

original: rnam par grol ba'i 'bras bu ni mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa thob pa'i don du'o //
analyzed: rnam par grol ba'i 'bras bu ni mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa thob pa'i don du'o //
translated: The result of liberation is for the sake of attaining non-abiding nirvana.

original: 'gro ba mgon med rnams dang ni //
analyzed: 'gro ba mgon med rnams dang ni //
translated: For the sake of those beings without a protector,

original: bdag cag ces bya ba ni ji ltar rgya mtsho gru bzhi pa la sogs pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: bdag cag ces bya ba ni ji ltar rgya mtsho gru bzhi pa la sogs pa lta bu'o //
translated: and for ourselves, as in the case of a four-cornered ocean and so forth.

original: byang chub thob pa'i don chen mdzad //
analyzed: byang chub thob pa'i don chen mdzad //
translated: You have performed the great deed of attaining enlightenment.

original: ces pa ni nyan thos dang / rang rgyal ba la sogs pa'i lam la ma bkod par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bkod par mdzad pa bka' drin chen zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: ces pa ni nyan thos dang / rang rgyal ba la sogs pa'i lam la ma bkod par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bkod par mdzad pa bka' drin chen zhes pa'i don to //
translated: This means that you have performed the great kindness of establishing them in unsurpassed, perfect enlightenment, without establishing them in the paths of the śrāvakas, pratyekabuddhas, and so on.

original: thabs gang gi sgo nas she na /
analyzed: thabs gang gi sgo nas she na /
translated: By what means?

original: sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i tshul bstan pa //🔽zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i tshul bstan pa // zhes gsungs te /
translated: You have revealed the way of the Magical Net.

original: bskyed pa lha'i rnal 'byor dang / rdzogs pa ye shes kyi rnal 'byor ni sgyu 'phrul dra ba ste /
analyzed: bskyed pa lha'i rnal 'byor dang / rdzogs pa ye shes kyi rnal 'byor ni sgyu 'phrul dra ba ste /
translated: The yoga of the deity of creation and the yoga of the gnosis of completion are the Magical Net.

original: de'i lam gyi sgo nas shes pa'o //
analyzed: de'i lam gyi sgo nas shes pa'o //
translated: You should understand that it is by means of that path.

original: 'di ni rnam dag legs pa'i lam //🔽zhes bya ba la /🔽bshad ma thag pa'i lam 'di ni bde bas bde bar sgrub pa'i phyir /
analyzed: 'di ni rnam dag legs pa'i lam // zhes bya ba la / bshad ma thag pa'i lam 'di ni bde bas bde bar sgrub pa'i phyir /
translated: This is the pure, excellent path.

original: rnam par dag pa legs pa'i lam ste /
analyzed: rnam par dag pa legs pa'i lam ste /
translated: This path that has just been explained is the pure, excellent path because it is accomplished by means of bliss.

original: dus gsum gyi bde bar gshegs pa'i gshegs shul 'di bkod pa la rjes su yi rang ngo zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: dus gsum gyi bde bar gshegs pa'i gshegs shul 'di bkod pa la rjes su yi rang ngo zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: This is the path that has been traveled by the sugatas of the three times. I rejoice in this arrangement. This is the meaning.

original: da ni zab mo sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa la rjes su yi rang ba bstan par bya ba'i phyir /🔽zab cing yangs la rgya che ste //
analyzed: da ni zab mo sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa la rjes su yi rang ba bstan par bya ba'i phyir / zab cing yangs la rgya che ste //
translated: Now, in order to demonstrate the rejoicing in the profound teaching of the Buddha,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /🔽rdo rje theg pa ni zab ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te / rdo rje theg pa ni zab ste /
translated: [the Bhagavān] declares, “profound, vast, and extensive,” and so forth.

original: rtogs par dka' pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rtogs par dka' pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The Vajra Vehicle is profound because it is difficult to realize.

original: yangs pa ni 'dir kun shang pa'o //
analyzed: yangs pa ni 'dir kun shang pa'o //
translated: Vast here is all-inclusive.

original: rgya che ba ni 'dir kun 'dus la theg pa gzhan du 'di ma 'dus pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rgya che ba ni 'dir kun 'dus la theg pa gzhan du 'di ma 'dus pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Extensive here is all-inclusive because this [Vajra Vehicle] is not included in other vehicles.

original: don che ba ni bdag gi'o //
analyzed: don che ba ni bdag gi'o //
translated: Great purpose is one’s own purpose.

original: 'gro ba'i don ni gzhan don te /
analyzed: 'gro ba'i don ni gzhan don te /
translated: The purpose of beings is the purpose of others.

original: de byed pa la de skad @184b ces bya'o //
analyzed: de byed pa la de skad @184b ces bya'o //
translated: One who accomplishes that is so-called.

original: sangs rgyas rnams kyi yul 'di ni //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rnams kyi yul 'di ni //
translated: This domain of the buddhas

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /

original: 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang rgyal dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyod yul ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang rgyal dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyod yul ma yin te /
translated: Here, this is not the domain of hearers, solitary realizers, bodhisattvas, and buddhas.

original: rdo rje 'chang chen po 'ba' zhig gi yul yin no zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: rdo rje 'chang chen po 'ba' zhig gi yul yin no zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it is the domain of only Great Vajradhara.

original: de'i phyir / rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyis bshad //
analyzed: de'i phyir / rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyis bshad //
translated: Therefore, we rejoice.🔽This is the meaning of the verse.🔽Thus, we also rejoice.

original: ces pa ni /
analyzed: ces pa ni /
translated: This is the meaning of the verse.

original: de dag gi phyir rjes su yi rang ngo zhes bya'o //

translated: Since it is like a pot with a hole in the bottom, it is frightening, and since it does not accomplish the welfare of self and others, it is not like that.🔽By whatever merit there is from writing this, may I become skilled in the means for abandoning all afflictions and their means.

original: 'di bris pa las bsod nams ci yod des ni nyon mongs ma lus spangs dang de yi thabs la mkhas par shog /'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i 'grel pa 'jam dpal gyi sbrul pa me'i dbang po grags pas mdzad pa /
analyzed: 'di bris pa las bsod nams ci yod des ni nyon mongs ma lus spangs dang de yi thabs la mkhas par shog /'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i 'grel pa 'jam dpal gyi sbrul pa me'i dbang po grags pas mdzad pa /
translated: The commentary on the Noble Mañjuśrī's Name is finished.

original: byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi bka' brgyud pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi bka' brgyud pa rdzogs so /
translated: The lineage of Avalokiteśvara Bodhisattva is complete.

original: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po aa bha ya badzra dang / bod kyi lo ts'a ba sbal rdo rje rgyal pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//
